Description.Text: Blades Hotel is conveniently situated in a quiet, residential area within walking distance of many famous landmarks such as Buckingham Palace, Westminster Abbey, The Tate Gallery, Harrods, the Houses of Parliament and many theatres and museums.

Quadruple-Room - Quadruple Room offers three twin beds. All rooms are newly refurbished to a high standard and are stylishly decorated in keeping with this elegant Victorian building. Comfortable single, double, twin and family bedrooms enable to cater for your needs. Facilities include modern small en-suite bathrooms, televisions, irons & ironing boards, hair-dryers, coffee and tea-making equipment and clocks in every room.
Single - Room - Single Room offers one small double bed. All rooms are newly refurbished to a high standard and are stylishly decorated in keeping with this elegant Victorian building. Comfortable single, double, twin and family bedrooms enable to cater for your needs. Facilities include modern small en-suite bathrooms, televisions, irons & ironing boards, hair-dryers, coffee and tea-making equipment and clocks in every room.
Double - Room - Double Room offers one double bed. All rooms are newly refurbished to a high standard and are stylishly decorated in keeping with this elegant Victorian building. Comfortable single, double, twin and family bedrooms enable to cater for your needs. Facilities include modern small en-suite bathrooms, televisions, irons & ironing boards, hair-dryers, coffee and tea-making equipment and clocks in every room.
Triple - Room - Triple Room offers one double bed and one single bed. All rooms are newly refurbished to a high standard and are stylishly decorated in keeping with this elegant Victorian building. Comfortable single, double, twin and family bedrooms enable to cater for your needs. Facilities include modern small en-suite bathrooms, televisions, irons & ironing boards, hair-dryers, coffee and tea-making equipment and clocks in every room.
